I received two new lungs from a

Can had to drop out of school midway because she unfortunately had
end-stage perforated lung disease, a

new lungs. Many experts cooperated.
This is the point that, yes, we are

to reduce waste in the environment in
Cambodia's capital, Don Nong, to make brooms, workers will
collect used plastic bottles, soak them

a specialized machine to spin fibers from which to bundle them.  These
brooms, compared to
traditional plastic brooms, are
considered by customers to be more durable. This broom is
very sturdy. The plastic does not easily fall
off the bamboo like
traditional hkia brooms, the owner of this facility said.
His goal is to reduce plastic waste pollution

us at a higher price than that.  has also

tons of plastic bottles into useful items,

bw game, although newly released, has achieved

took 3 to 4 years on the

Clarifying today, Ben Da Border Guards,
Border Guards of Ba Ri province, have carried
out procedures to receive eight crew
members on the fishing boat p97 209 TS of Mr. Ngo
Van Tho that was sunk by waves in the waters of
Ba Ri province.
Mr. Tho's fishing vessel sank at
about 13:00 on February 14 in an area
about 66 nautical miles
south-southeast of Vung Tau. By about 15:00 the same day,
another fishing vessel was discovered and promptly rescued.
This morning, the ship docked at Ben Da port and
handed over the eight injured crew members to the
Ben Da room staff according to separate regulations.
Mr. Ngo Van Tho, the ship's owner and
captain of the p970 TS fishing boat, stayed behind.  Along with
other means, continue to search for the
remaining two missing crew members
after being cared for. Eight crew members have gradually
stabilized their health and returned to their families.
Vung Tau City People's Committee and the
police station  Ben Da visited and gave gifts
to the crew members in distress and the families
of the missing crew members with a total
amount of 25 million VND at Ben Da border station
and the Border Guard Women's Association of Ba
Ri Vung Tau province gave three sets of gifts.  and
cash with a total value of 6 million
VND. This is the end of our 60 Hours program today.
